org.shared.fft

Class ConvolutionCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.shared.fft.FftCache<ComplexArray,RealArray>
      • org.shared.fft.ConvolutionCache

  • public class ConvolutionCache
extends FftCache<ComplexArray,RealArray>
    A specialization of FftCache for RealArrays and ComplexArrays.
